title: Quantitative analysis of loxoprofen sodium loaded microspheres comprising pectin and its thiolated conjugates: In-vivo evaluation of their sustained release behavior
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Aisha Anam, Ghulam Abbas, Shahid Shah, Malik Saadullah, Dure Shahwar, Khalid Mahmood, Muhammad Hanif, Nabeel Ahmad, Ejaz Basheer, Ahmad J. Obaidullah, Hadil Faris Alotaibi, Mohammed Alqarni, Nabeela Ameer
